column2: You're standing in the lobby of a deserted secret facility.
You're in a long empty hallway. All you can see is one eerie door to the east.
You're in what looks like a laboratory. The place has been ransacked like someone was looking for something.
You're in one of the head scientists office. It looks like someone's been rummaging around in here and there's a closet door to the west with a big lock on it.
There's an old dusty rug on the ground.
Looks like you've fallen through a trap door but you can't see anything.
You're in some kind of secret testing facility. Watch out for the test monkeys... they look hungry.
You're in a secret storage room with tons of questionably sources medical equipment.
You're in the office of the evil man who's been running this whole underground facility.
You're in the final room. Youve almost made it out and you can finally see the light of day again.
